alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:25PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County northeast of Happy Jack through 700 PM MST... At 624 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tremaine Lake to the northeast of Happy Jack, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremaine Lake, Long Lake and Chavez Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
